exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainUISkin" width="1206" height="750" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" alpha="0" />
    <!-- 顶栏 -->
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0">
        <e:Image source="bg_top" visible="false" />
        <e:Label text="自由匹配" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"
                 includeInLayout="{fast.real}" visible="false" />
        <!--<e:Label text="局数：" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
        -->
        <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="{fast.not}" includeInLayout="{fast.not}">
            <e:Group>
                <e:Label text="局数：" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
                <e:Label id="round" text="1/10" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-1" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:Group>
                <e:Label text="扣费方式：" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
                <e:Label id="mode" text="房主付费" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-1" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:Group>
                <e:Label text="房间号：" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
                <e:Label id="roomId" text="123456" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" textColor="0xffe19f" />
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-1" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:layout>
                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="62" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
    <!-- 按钮 -->
    <component:ButtonUI id="menu" icon="btn_menu" x="18" y="22" width="86" height="88" />
    <component:ButtonUI id="setting" icon="btn_setting" right="16" y="18" width="96" height="98" />
    <e:Group right="16" y="370">
        <component:ButtonUI id="chat" icon="btn_chat" width="96" height="98" />
        <e:Button id="voice" icon="btn_voice" width="96" height="98" visible="false" includeInLayout="false" />
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout gap="3" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:Group>
    <!-- 打牌 -->
    <component:GameUI id="game" />
    <!-- 菜单 -->
    <e:Group id="menuGroup" y="-378" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false" mask="{menuMask}">
        <e:Image scale9Grid="68,47,165,54" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="bg_menu" height="473" />
        <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
            <e:Image source="bg_menu_line" y="0" x="0" />
            <e:Image source="bg_menu_line" y="0" x="0" />
            <e:Image source="bg_menu_line" y="0" x="0" />
            <e:layout>
                <e:VerticalLayout gap="108" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
        <e:DataGroup id="menuList" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                <e:Skin width="327" height="111">
                    <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" alpha="0" touchEnabled="false" />
                    <e:Image source="{data.img}" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
            <e:ArrayCollection>
                <!--<e:Object img="menu_viewer" />
                -->
                <e:Object img="menu_share" />
                <e:Object img="menu_rule" />
                <e:Object img="menu_top" />
                <e:Object />
            </e:ArrayCollection>
            <e:layout>
                <e:VerticalLayout gap="1" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:DataGroup>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Rect id="menuMask" width="100%" height="100%" y="118" />
    <!-- 语音 -->
    <e:Group width="108" height="293" y="272" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false">
        <e:Image source="bg_voice" top="-6" bottom="-27" left="-16" right="-16" />
        <e:DataGroup id="voiceGroup" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false">
            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                <e:Skin states="dark,light" currentState="{data.state}">
                    <e:Image source="voice" scale9Grid="7,8,1,0" width="{data.width}" />
                    <e:Image source="voice_percent" scale9Grid="12,11,1,0" top="-3" bottom="-8" left="-5" right="-5"
                             includeIn="light" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
            <e:layout>
                <e:VerticalLayout gap="12" horizontalAlign="center" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:DataGroup>
    </e:Group>
    <!-- 特效 -->
    <e:Group id="effect" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShareUISkin" width="1206" height="750" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect id="rect" width="100%" height="100%" alpha=".8" />
    <e:Group id="main" width="{width}" height="{height}" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false">
        <e:Image source="{source}" right="149" bottom="15" />
        <e:Image id="arrow" source="arrow" right="41" bottom="21" alpha="0" />
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TempSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" states="single,total" xmlns:component="component.*"
        width="1207" height="750">
	<e:Image source="stmt_bg" horizontalCenter="0" />
	<e:Group width="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" height="100%">
		<e:Group includeIn="total" horizontalCenter="0" top="140">
			<e:Label text="斗地主" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
			<e:Label text="自由匹配" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" includeInLayout="{fast.real}"
			         visible="{fast.real}" />
			<e:Group includeInLayout="{fast.not}" visible="{fast.not}">
				<e:Label text="房间号：" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
				<e:Label text="{roomId}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group includeInLayout="{fast.not}" visible="{fast.not}">
				<e:Label text="局数：" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
				<e:Label text="{round}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="104" />
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="55" y="172">
			<e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
			<e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
			<e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
			<e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="108" />
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group y="187" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:DataGroup id="players" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false" horizontalCenter="0" y="-12"
			             dataProvider="{dataProvider}">
				<e:dataProvider.single>
					<e:ArrayCollection>
						<e:Array>
							<e:Object state="winner" nickname="hhd" />
							<e:Object ddd="null" />
							<e:Object ddd="null" />
						</e:Array>
					</e:ArrayCollection>
				</e:dataProvider.single>
				<e:itemRendererSkinName>
					<e:Skin states="loser,winner" currentState="{data.state}" width="1097" height="108">
						<e:Group verticalCenter="0" left="200">
							<e:Group>
								<e:Image source="head_bg" horizontalCenter="0" />
								<e:Image source="{data.headImgUrl}" mask="{rect}" height="81" width="81" />
								<e:Image id="rect" source="head" width="81" height="81" />
							</e:Group>
						</e:Group>
						<e:Label fontFamily="黑体" size="24" text="{data.nickname}" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="{data.showNick}"
						         textColor="0xffd9a7" />
						<e:Group verticalCenter="0.5" horizontalCenter="0" visible="{data.showCenter}">
							<e:DataGroup verticalCenter="0" dataProvider="{data.prop}">
								<e:itemRendererSkinName>
									<e:Skin>
										<e:Group>
											<e:Label text="{data.key}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffdd69" />
											<e:Label text="{data.value}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffdd69" textAlign="right" />
											<e:layout>
												<e:HorizontalLayout gap="14" />
											</e:layout>
										</e:Group>
									</e:Skin>
								</e:itemRendererSkinName>
								<e:layout>
									<e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="2" />
								</e:layout>
							</e:DataGroup>
						</e:Group>
						<e:Group verticalCenter="0.5" left="770">
							<e:Label text="得分：" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
							<e:Label text="{data.totalScore}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="{data.txtColer}" />
							<e:layout>
								<e:HorizontalLayout/>
							</e:layout>
						</e:Group>
						<e:Image source="king" x="150" y="-37.58" includeIn="winner" />
						<e:Image source="king_mark" right="-2" bottom="-5" includeIn="winner" visible="false" />
						<e:Image source="stmt_line" bottom="0" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false" />
					</e:Skin>
				</e:itemRendererSkinName>
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout gap="0" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:DataGroup>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group y="601" horizontalCenter="0">
			<component:ButtonUI id="continue" icon="txt_continue" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80" includeIn="single" />
			<component:ButtonUI id="back" icon="txt_back" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80" includeIn="total" />
			<component:ButtonUI id="share" icon="txt_flaunt" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80" includeIn="total" />
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="159" />
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group top="72" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="stmt_title2" includeIn="total" />
		<e:Image source="stmt_title1" includeIn="single" />
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TempSkin1" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="1207">
	<e:Label fontFamily="黑体" size="24" text="{data.nickname}" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xffd9a7" horizontalCenter="-221"/>
    <e:Group verticalCenter="0" left="200">
        <e:Group>
            <e:Image source="head_bg" horizontalCenter="0" />
            <e:Image source="{data.headImgUrl}" mask="{rect}" height="81" width="81" />
            <e:Image id="rect" source="head" width="81" height="81" />
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="component.ButtonUISkin" states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" alpha="0" />
    <e:Group scaleX.down=".9" scaleY.down=".9" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="{width}" height="{height}">
        <e:Image id="bgDisplay" source="{bg}" scale9Grid="{scale9Grid}" top="{bgTop}" bottom="{bgBottom}"
                 left="{bgLeft}" right="{bgRight}" />
        <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" fontFamily="黑体" size="{size}" textColor="{textColor}" horizontalCenter="0"
                 verticalCenter="0" />
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="component.CountUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="count" top="-2" bottom="-12" left="-6" right="-6" />
    <e:Group width="0" height="0" x="100" verticalCenter="0">
        <e:DataGroup horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" dataProvider="{time}">
            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                <e:Skin>
                    <e:Label text="{data}" fontFamily="黑体" size="40" textColor="0xE7FFCA" bold="true" />
                </e:Skin>
            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
            <e:layout>
                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="3" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:DataGroup>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Image source="count_percent" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" mask="{percent}" />
    <e:Group id="percent" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="component.DialogUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <e:Rect id="rect" width="1206" height="750" alpha=".5" />
    <e:Group id="main" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
        <!--<e:Image source="alone/bg_dialog.png" scale9Grid="27,62,865,480" left="-10" right="-22" top="-5"
                     bottom="-26" width="{contentWidth}" height="{contentHeight}" />
        -->
        <e:Group>
            <e:Group width="{contentWidth}" height="{contentHeight}" elementsContent="{elements}" />
            <e:Group width="100%" y="-60" height="150" touchThrough="true" touchEnabled="false">
                <e:Image source="{title}" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                <component:ButtonUI id="closeButton" icon="close" verticalCenter="0" right="-23" width="84" height="87"
                                    visible="{canBack}" />
            </e:Group>
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="component.GameUISkin" width="1206" height="750" states="waiting,betting,playing"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="16030672711"/>
    <!-- 准备 -->
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" y="480" includeIn="waiting">
        <e:Group>
            <component:ButtonUI id="share" icon="txt_share" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80"
                                scale9Grid="40,40,132,3" horizontalCenter="0" />
            <e:Image id="waiting" source="waiting" y="-3" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group>
            <component:ButtonUI id="ready" icon="txt_ready" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                scale9Grid="40,40,76,3" />
            <!--<component:ButtonUI id="stand" icon="txt_stand" bg="btn_circle" width="212" height="86"
                                    scale9Grid="40,40,76,3" />
            -->
            <e:layout>
                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="86" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="0" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:Group>
    <!-- 打牌 -->
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" excludeFrom="waiting" touchEnabled="false">
        <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" y="70">
            <e:DataGroup horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" scaleX=".6532" scaleY=".6532">
                <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                    <e:Skin>
                        <e:Image source="poker_back" top="-5" bottom="-6" left="-5" right="-4" />
                    </e:Skin>
                </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                <e:ArrayCollection>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object/>
                </e:ArrayCollection>
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="27" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:DataGroup>
            <e:DataGroup id="hole" itemRenderer="component.PokerItemUI" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"
                         scaleX=".6532" scaleY=".6532">
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="27" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:DataGroup>
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" bottom="20">
            <e:Group width="689" height="86">
                <e:Group id="betGroup" horizontalCenter="0" visible="{me.current}" includeIn="betting">
                    <component:ButtonUI icon="{'txt_' + bet.source0}" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                        scale9Grid="40,40,76,3" />
                    <component:ButtonUI icon="{'txt_' + bet.source1}" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80"
                                        scale9Grid="40,40,72,3" />
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:HorizontalLayout gap="27" />
                    </e:layout>
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" visible="{me.current}" includeIn="playing">
                    <component:CountUI startTime="{startTime}" horizontalCenter="0" y="-90" />
                    <e:Group>
                        <component:ButtonUI id="pass" icon="txt_bc" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80"
                                            scale9Grid="40,40,76,3" visible="{seat.canPass}"
                                            includeInLayout="{seat.canPass}" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="hint" icon="txt_hint" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                            scale9Grid="40,40,76,3" visible="{seat.canTip}"
                                            includeInLayout="{seat.canTip}" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="do" icon="txt_cp" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                            scale9Grid="40,40,72,3" />
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="27" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                </e:Group>
                <e:DataGroup id="mine" itemRenderer="component.PokerItemUI" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="15" scaleX=".8"
                             scaleY=".8" visible="false">
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-62" />
                    </e:layout>
                </e:DataGroup>
                <e:Image id="mineTxt" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false" />
            </e:Group>
            <e:DataGroup id="poker" itemRenderer="component.PokerItemUI">
                <e:layout>
                    <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-56" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:DataGroup>
            <e:layout>
                <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="43" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:Group>
			<e:Group id="tsleftPlayer" width="689" height="60.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" left="139" top="164">
				<e:layout>
					<e:TileLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="tsrightPlayer" height="61.67" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="139" width="689" bottom="376">
				<e:layout>
					<e:TileLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
    </e:Group>
    <!-- 头像 -->
    <component:PlayerUI id="me" x="16" bottom="82" state="me" />
    <component:PlayerUI id="leftPlayer" x="16" y="197" />
    <component:PlayerUI id="rightPlayer" right="16" y="197" state="right" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="component.PanelUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="alone/bg_dialog.png" scale9Grid="27,62,865,480" left="-10" right="-22" top="-5" bottom="-26"
             width="{contentWidth}" height="{contentHeight}" />
    <e:Group>
        <e:Group width="100%" height="57">
            <e:Label id="titleDisplay" fontFamily="黑体" size="32" textColor="0xE0CED6" x="40" y="14" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group width="{contentWidth}" height="{contentHeight}" elementsContent="{elements}" />
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout gap="0" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="component.PlayerUISkin" states="left,right,me,none" currentState="{state}"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <e:Group id="g_player" width="117" height="152">
        <e:Group>
            <e:Group>
                <e:Group width="81" height="86">
                    <e:Image source="head_bg" horizontalCenter="0" />
                    <e:Image source="bg_none" horizontalCenter="0" y="-2" />
                    <e:Image source="{head}" mask="{rect}" width="81" height="81" />
                    <e:Image id="rect" source="head" width="81" height="81" />
                    <e:Group visible="{offline}">
                        <e:Image source="offline_bg" />
                        <e:Image source="offline" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Image id="shine" source="head_shine" horizontalCenter="0" y="-6" visible="{current}" />
                    <e:Image source="host" x="-11" y="-14" visible="{host}" />
                    <e:Group id="gif" scaleX=".49" scaleY=".49" />
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group width="0">
                    <e:Label fontFamily="黑体" size="18" height="18" text="{uname}" horizontalCenter="0" />
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group>
                    <e:Image source="score" left="-9" right="-1" top="-6" bottom="-27" />
                    <e:Group width="0" height="0" x="77.5" y="18">
                        <e:Label fontFamily="黑体" size="30" textColor="0xEFD065" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"
                                 text="{score}" />
                    </e:Group>
                </e:Group>
                <e:layout>
                    <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group x="132" right.right="132" y="-76">
            <e:Group excludeFrom="me,none" right.right="0">
                <e:Group visible="{showCount}">
                    <e:Group x.me="-91" x.left="-90" right.right="-96">
                        <e:Image source="poker_back" scaleX="0.35" scaleY="0.35" />
                        <e:DataGroup horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" dataProvider="{count}">
                            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                <e:Skin>
                                    <e:Image source="{'l' + data}" />
                                </e:Skin>
                            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                            <e:layout>
                                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
                            </e:layout>
                        </e:DataGroup>
                    </e:Group>
                    <component:CountUI startTime="{startTime}" right.right="0" y="100" visible="{current}"
                                       includeInLayout="{current}" />
                </e:Group>
                <e:DataGroup itemRenderer="component.PokerItemUI" dataProvider="{dataProvider}" scaleX=".8" scaleY=".8">
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="10" horizontalGap="-62" verticalGap="-67" />
                    </e:layout>
                </e:DataGroup>
                <e:layout>
                    <e:VerticalLayout gap="13" horizontalAlign.right="right" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:Image source="{txt}" right.right="0" y="116" />
        </e:Group>
        <e:Group id="chatGroup" x="109" right.right="109" y="-98" width="244" height="117" visible="false">
            <e:Image source="bg_chat" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" skewY.right="180" />
            <e:Label id="chat" fontFamily="黑体" size="21.42" text="快点吧，花儿都要谢了！" left="27" left.right="22" right="22"
                     right.right="27" top="16" bottom="35" lineSpacing="3" />
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="btn_invite" x="9" y="25">
        <e:Skin width="99" height="102" states="up,down">
            <e:Image source="btn_share" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" scaleX.down="0.9" scaleY.down="0.9" />
        </e:Skin>
    </e:Button>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="component.PokerItemUISkin" states="up,down" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group y.down="-20" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false">
        <e:Group top="-5" bottom="-6" left="-5" right="-4">
            <e:Image source="poker" />
            <e:Image source="{type}" right="13" bottom="13" />
            <e:Group x="9" y="9">
                <e:Image source="{value}" />
                <e:Image source="{type_m}" scaleX=".45" scaleY=".45" />
                <e:layout>
                    <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="0" />
                </e:layout>
            </e:Group>
            <e:Image source="host_mark" right="4" y="3" visible="{mark}" />
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChatDialogUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <component:DialogUI id="dialog" contentWidth="557" contentHeight="352" canBack="false">
        <component:elements>
            <e:Array>
                <e:Group horizontalCenter="170" verticalCenter="90">
                    <e:Image source="set_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                    <e:TabBar id="tabBar" horizontalCenter="0" height="55" top="0">
                        <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                            <e:Skin states="up,down" width="270" height="55">
                                <e:Rect width="270" height="55" alpha="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                                <e:Image source="chat_titlebg" skewY="{data.skewY}" horizontalCenter="0"
                                         verticalCenter="0" includeIn="up" />
                                <e:Image source="bg_tab_curr" skewY="{data.skewY}" horizontalCenter="0"
                                         verticalCenter="0" includeIn="down" />
                                <e:Image source="{data.title}" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                            </e:Skin>
                        </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                        <e:ArrayCollection>
                            <e:Object title="chat_title1" skewY="180" />
                            <e:Object title="chat_title2" />
                        </e:ArrayCollection>
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-1" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:TabBar>
                    <e:ViewStack selectedIndex="{tabBar.selectedIndex}" width="557" height="297" bottom="0">
                        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                            <e:Scroller maxHeight="332" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-10">
                                <e:DataGroup id="list">
                                    <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                        <e:Skin>
                                            <e:Image touchEnabled="false" source="chat_bar" />
                                            <e:Label fontFamily="黑体" text="{data}" size="24" bold="true" x="11.98"
                                                     verticalCenter="0.5" touchEnabled="false" textColor="0xffdaa8" />
                                        </e:Skin>
                                    </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                    <e:layout>
                                        <e:VerticalLayout gap="13" />
                                    </e:layout>
                                </e:DataGroup>
                            </e:Scroller>
                        </e:Group>
                        <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                            <!--<e:Group width="557" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
                            -->
                            <e:Image source="chat_facebg" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-8.5" />
                            <e:Scroller height="230" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-10">
                                <e:DataGroup id="expression">
                                    <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                        <e:Skin>
                                            <e:Image source="{data}" touchEnabled="false" />
                                        </e:Skin>
                                    </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                    <e:layout>
                                        <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="5" horizontalGap="0" verticalGap="0" />
                                    </e:layout>
                                </e:DataGroup>
                            </e:Scroller>
                            <!--</e:Group>
                            -->
                        </e:Group>
                    </e:ViewStack>
                </e:Group>
            </e:Array>
        </component:elements>
    </component:DialogUI>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DissolutionDialogUISkin" states="confirm,progressing,waiting,reject" currentState="confirm"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <component:DialogUI id="dialog" title="dis_title" contentWidth="671" contentHeight="393" canBack="false"
                        canClose="false">
        <component:elements>
            <e:Array>
                <e:Image source="dis_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
                    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" includeIn="confirm">
                        <e:Label text="解散房间需要征求所有在线玩家同意，\n您确定要申请解散房间吗？" fontFamily="黑体" size="32" textAlign="center"
                                 lineSpacing="4" y="126.95" horizontalCenter="0.5" textColor="0x412417" />
                        <e:Group bottom="40" horizontalCenter="0">
                            <component:ButtonUI id="cancel" icon="txt_cancel" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80" />
                            <component:ButtonUI id="ok" icon="txt_ok" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80" />
                            <e:layout>
                                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="125" />
                            </e:layout>
                        </e:Group>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" excludeFrom="confirm">
                        <!--<e:Group x="12" y="0">
                        <e:DataGroup id="players" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
                            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                <e:Skin>
                                    <e:Group>
                                        <e:Group width="81" height="86">
                                            <e:Image source="head_bg" horizontalCenter="0" y="-6" />
                                            <e:Image source="{data.headImgUrl}" mask="{rect}" width="81" height="81" />
                                            <e:Image id="rect" source="head" width="81" height="81" />
                                            <e:Group width="70" height="70" right="-32" bottom="-8">
                                                <e:Image source="{data.state}" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                                            </e:Group>
                                        </e:Group>
                                        <e:Group width="0">
                                            <e:Label fontFamily="黑体" size="18" text="{data.nickname}"
                                                     horizontalCenter="0" />
                                        </e:Group>
                                        <e:layout>
                                            <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" />
                                        </e:layout>
                                    </e:Group>
                                </e:Skin>
                            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                            <e:layout>
                                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="87" />
                            </e:layout>
                        </e:DataGroup>
                    </e:Group>
                    -->
                    <e:Group top="60" horizontalCenter="0.5">
                        <e:Label id="txt_who" text="谁？要求立即解散牌局" size="32" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x412417" />
                        <e:Label id="txt_cur_total" text="2/2人" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0xb90000" />
                        <e:Label text="已经同意解散" size="32" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x412417" />
                        <e:Label text="3人同意即可解散房间" size="28" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x857155" />
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="10" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group y="230" horizontalCenter="0" x="12">
                        <e:Image source="progress" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                        <e:Image id="progress" source="progress_percent" verticalCenter="0" left="0"
                                 scale9Grid="4,2,639,16" />
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group bottom="40" horizontalCenter="0" includeIn="progressing">
                        <component:ButtonUI id="reject" icon="txt_reject" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="agree" icon="txt_agree" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80" />
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="125" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Label text.waiting="正在等待其他玩家选择" text.reject="有玩家拒绝解散房间" fontFamily="黑体" size="32"
                             textColor="0x412417" bottom="63" horizontalCenter="0.5" excludeFrom="progressing" text="" />
                </e:Group>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Array>
    </component:elements>
</component:DialogUI>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MessageDialogUISkin" states="normal,loading,alert,confirm" currentState="{state}"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <component:DialogUI id="dialog" title="{title}" contentWidth="619" contentHeight="151" contentHeight.loading="163"
                        contentHeight.alert="206" contentHeight.confirm="206" canBack="{canBack}" canClose="{canClose}"
                        onClose="{onClose}">
        <component:elements>
            <e:Array>
                <e:Image source="set_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="619" height.loading="163"
                         height.alert="206" height.confirm="206" />
                <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
                    <e:Group>
                        <e:Group width="61" height="63" includeIn="loading">
                            <e:Image id="loading" source="loading_mini" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                        </e:Group>
                        <e:Label text="{text}" fontFamily="黑体" size="32" textColor="0x412417" />
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" gap="25" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group includeIn="alert,confirm">
                        <component:ButtonUI id="cancel" icon="txt_cancel" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80"
                                            includeIn="confirm" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="ok" icon="txt_ok" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80" />
                        <!--<component:ButtonUI id="cancel" icon="txt_cancel" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80"
                                                scale9Grid="25,24,174,34" includeIn="confirm" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="ok" icon="txt_ok" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                            scale9Grid="25,24,174,34" />
                        -->
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="125" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:VerticalLayout gap="18" horizontalAlign="center" />
                    </e:layout>
                </e:Group>
            </e:Array>
        </component:elements>
    </component:DialogUI>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ResultDialogUISkin" states="single,total" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <component:DialogUI id="dialog" contentWidth="1207" contentHeight="750" canBack="false" canClose="false">
        <component:elements>
            <e:Array>
                <e:Image source="stmt_bg" horizontalCenter="0" />
                <e:Group width="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" height="100%">
                    <e:Group includeIn="total" horizontalCenter="0" top="140">
                        <e:Label text="斗地主" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                        <e:Label text="自由匹配" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7"
                                 includeInLayout="{fast.real}" visible="{fast.real}" />
                        <e:Group includeInLayout="{fast.not}" visible="{fast.not}">
                            <e:Label text="房间号：" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                            <e:Label text="{roomId}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                            <e:layout>
                                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
                            </e:layout>
                        </e:Group>
                        <e:Group includeInLayout="{fast.not}" visible="{fast.not}">
                            <e:Label text="局数：" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                            <e:Label text="{round}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                            <e:layout>
                                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
                            </e:layout>
                        </e:Group>
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="104" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group x="55" y="172">
                        <e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
                        <e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
                        <e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
                        <e:Image source="stmt_line" y="0" x="0" />
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:VerticalLayout gap="108" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group y="187" horizontalCenter="0">
                        <e:DataGroup id="players" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false" horizontalCenter="0"
                                     y="-12" dataProvider="{dataProvider}">
                            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                <e:Skin states="loser,winner" currentState="{data.state}" width="1097" height="108">
                                    <e:Group verticalCenter="0" left="200">
                                        <e:Group>
                                            <e:Image source="head_bg" horizontalCenter="0" />
                                            <e:Image source="{data.headImgUrl}" mask="{rect}" height="81" width="81" />
                                            <e:Image id="rect" source="head" width="81" height="81" />
                                        </e:Group>
                                    </e:Group>
                                    <e:Label fontFamily="黑体" size="24" text="{data.nickname}" verticalCenter="0"
                                             left="{data.showNick}" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                                    <e:Group verticalCenter="0.5" horizontalCenter="0" visible="{data.showCenter}">
                                        <e:DataGroup verticalCenter="0" dataProvider="{data.prop}">
                                            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                                <e:Skin>
                                                    <e:Group>
                                                        <e:Label text="{data.key}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24"
                                                                 textColor="0xffdd69" />
                                                        <e:Label text="{data.value}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24"
                                                                 textColor="0xffdd69" textAlign="right" />
                                                        <e:layout>
                                                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="14" />
                                                        </e:layout>
                                                    </e:Group>
                                                </e:Skin>
                                            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                                            <e:layout>
                                                <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="2" />
                                            </e:layout>
                                        </e:DataGroup>
                                    </e:Group>
                                    <e:Group verticalCenter="0.5" left="770">
                                        <e:Label text="得分：" fontFamily="黑体" size="24" textColor="0xffd9a7" />
                                        <e:Label text="{data.totalScore}" fontFamily="黑体" size="24"
                                                 textColor="{data.txtColer}" />
                                        <e:layout>
                                            <e:HorizontalLayout/>
                                        </e:layout>
                                    </e:Group>
                                    <e:Image source="king" x="150" y="-37.58" includeIn="winner" />
                                    <e:Image source="king_mark" right="-2" bottom="-5" includeIn="winner"
                                             visible="false" />
                                    <e:Image source="stmt_line" bottom="0" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false" />
                                </e:Skin>
                            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
                            <e:layout>
                                <e:VerticalLayout gap="0" />
                            </e:layout>
                        </e:DataGroup>
                    </e:Group>
                    <e:Group y="601" horizontalCenter="0">
                        <component:ButtonUI id="continue" icon="txt_continue" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                            includeIn="single" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="back" icon="txt_back" bg="btn_red" width="173" height="80"
                                            includeIn="total" />
                        <component:ButtonUI id="share" icon="txt_flaunt" bg="btn_green" width="173" height="80"
                                            includeIn="total" />
                        <e:layout>
                            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="159" />
                        </e:layout>
                    </e:Group>
                </e:Group>
                <e:Group top="72" horizontalCenter="0">
                    <e:Image source="stmt_title2" includeIn="total" />
                    <e:Image source="stmt_title1" includeIn="single" />
                </e:Group>
            </e:Array>
        </component:elements>
    </component:DialogUI>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RuleDialogUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <component:DialogUI title="help_title" contentWidth="1007" contentHeight="647">
        <component:elements>
            <e:Array>
                <e:Group width="1007" height="647" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
                    <e:Image source="help_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                    <!--<e:Image source="help_title" horizontalCenter="0" y="-24.29" />-->
                    <e:Scroller left="50" right="50" top="50" bottom="50">
                        <e:Group>
                            <e:Label textFlow="{rule}" fontFamily="黑体" size="30" textColor="0xDAD8D9" lineSpacing="7"
                                     width="100%" />
                        </e:Group>
                    </e:Scroller>
                </e:Group>
            </e:Array>
        </component:elements>
    </component:DialogUI>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SettingDialogUISkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:component="component.*">
    <component:DialogUI title="set_title" contentWidth="557" contentHeight="352">
        <component:elements>
            <e:Array>
                <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
                    <e:Image source="set_bg" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
                    <!--<e:Image source="set_title" horizontalCenter="0" y="-20" />-->
                    <e:Image source="set_music" x="140" y="109" />
                    <e:Image source="set_effect" x="140" y="208" />
                    <e:ToggleSwitch id="music" selected="true" x="286" y="93">
                        <e:Skin states="up,down" width="163" height="70">
                            <e:Image source="set_off" horizontalCenter.down="0" verticalCenter.down="0"
                                     visible.down="false" />
                            <e:Image source="set_on" x="12" visible.up="false" />
                        </e:Skin>
                    </e:ToggleSwitch>
                    <e:ToggleSwitch id="effect" selected="true" x="286" y="191">
                        <e:Skin states="up,down" width="163" height="70">
                            <e:Image source="set_off" horizontalCenter.down="0" verticalCenter.down="0"
                                     visible.down="false" />
                            <e:Image source="set_on" x="12" visible.up="false" />
                        </e:Skin>
                    </e:ToggleSwitch>
                    <e:layout>
                        <e:BasicLayout/>
                    </e:layout>
                </e:Group>
            </e:Array>
        </component:elements>
    </component:DialogUI>
</e:Skin>
